NotFound.title: Nothing Found
NotFound.description: The page you are trying to open does not exist. You may have mistyped the address or the page has been moved. If you believe this is an error, please contact support.

Home.description: Kvas is a convenient and intuitive utility for managing home internet. With it, you can easily configure a VPN connection, optimize DNS settings, and much more, ensuring network stability and security. All this is in one simple interface!

whitelist.title: Whitelist Configuration
whitelist.subtitle: Manage allowed domains/IP for each VPN service
